issue.title: [Ruby] Use Compute functions for Enumerable operations on Column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently operations like 
```java

table['column'].sum
```
 use Enumerable module and much slower than using Arrow::Function sum
